conbody.p: To open the sample feature files, go to Include > features > operations. Double-click to open one of the following .feature files:

row.entry: This file outlines the scenario to perform the dividing actions on the react calculator.
This file outlines the scenario to perform the minus actions on the react calculator.
This file outlines the scenario to perform the multiplying actions on the react calculator.
This file outlines the scenario to perform the plus actions on the react calculator.

conbody.p: To learn more about feature files creation and maintenance in Katalon Studio, you can refer to this document: Create & maintain feature files.

image.alt: Feature files in the BDD project
